name: DONORO Dog Kennels and Crates for Medium Dogs, Portable Pop Up Indoor Pet Cage with Sturdy Wire Frame, Collapsible Travel Crate Soft Sided Cat Bag Escape Proof (Brown, 28.0" L x 18.0" W x 22.0" H)
short_description: 【SAFE & SECURE CONSTRUCTION】This portable dog kennel is with protected seams and reinforced corners ensure your pet's safety. Made from durable quality & water-resistant materials makes it a great crate for small and medium dogs/cat/rabbit.
【THREE DOORS DESIGN】The dog cage features 3 high-density mesh windows for convenient access and be more ventilate.Double Zipper avoids pet’s escaping. Removable pad is comfortable and washable.

【DIMENSION】28"Lx18"Wx22"H,would fit 1-2 cats.ATTENTION:JUST fit small dog like Standard Poodle,Schnauzer OR SMALLER PET. 32"Lx21"Wx26"H,would fit Medium Pet like Boxer/Bulldog/Chihuahua/ French Bulldog. Please compare it's size with the kennel you have and choose the right size.

【EASY TO FOLD AND UNFOLD】The sturdy and flexible steel wire makes sets up in seconds and requires no assembly, folds flat when not in use for easy carrying and storing. Warping occurs sometimes. Easy to get back to normal.
【OCCASIONS】This pop up dog kennel is ideal for indoor and outdoor use. Great as a car crate or travel kennel for camping and day trips.
【QUALITY GUARANTEE】1-Year Manufacturer's Warranty on dog kennel. Please contact seller if you have any questions.

name: MidWest Homes for Pets 24-Inch Blue Fashion iCrate for Small Breeds, 12-20 lbs, Single Door Folding Dog Crate with Divider Panel, Leak-Proof Tray & Secure Latch, Portable, Durable & Easy to Assemble
short_description: IDEAL FOR 12-20 LB DOGS: Measures 24 x 18 x 19 inches – perfect for Fox Terriers, Pugs, Chihuahuas & similar breeds. For dogs near 20 lbs, consider sizing up to our 30-inch model so they have plenty of room to get comfortable.

WE DON'T CUT CORNERS, WE PERFECT THEM: Precision welding, rounded corner clips & slide-bolt latch with Paw Block mitigate snags, cuts & escapes. With rigorous safety testing, iCrate provides peace of mind knowing your dog is safe while you're away.

DURABLE & STYLISH: Sturdy metal wire design and a fashion-forward blue e-coat finish resist rust and everyday wear. Complete with leak-proof tray, rubber feet, carry handle, and tool-free assembly, it brings both form and function to your home.

SUPPORTS CRATE TRAINING: A divider panel lets the crate grow with your dog, from puppy kennel to full-size crate. Large openings and low thresholds ease the crate training process and help your dog feel more at home.

LIFE GOES BETTER WITH PETS: A family-owned business based in Indiana, MidWest Homes for Pets brings over 100 years of pet product expertise and a commitment to quality, rigorous safety testing, and excellent US-based customer service.
product_description: Give your dog a safe, comfortable place to call their own with the MidWest Homes for Pets Fashion iCrate Single Door Dog Crate. This stylish blue metal wire dog crate features newly enhanced security features, including a patented Paw Block and locking tips on the slide-bolt latch – so you can feel confident your pet is secure whether they're relaxing at home or hitting the road with you. Designed with both pets and parents in mind, iCrate dog crates come complete with a divider panel (to grow with your puppy), a durable leak-proof pan for easy cleanup, rubber feet to protect your floors, and a carrying handle for added convenience. Plus, you can fold it flat in seconds without tools, making it perfect for travel, storage or quick set-up anywhere you need it – from your living room to a beachside vacation rental. Built from precision-welded metal wire with a blue e-coat finish that brings a touch of warmth to your home, the iCrate is durable enough for everyday use while resisting rust and wear over time. Larger openings and low thresholds make it easier for your dog to enter and exit the crate, easing the crate training process and helping them feel more at home. At MidWest Homes for Pets, we know your dog is family. That's why every crate is backed by a 1-Year Manufacturer's Warranty and supported by our Indiana-based customer care team, making the iCrate a trusted choice for creating a secure, comfortable home for your dog.

name: New World Double Door Folding Metal 30-Inch Dog Crate, Includes Leak-Proof Pan, Floor Protecting Feet, & New Patented Features, for Medium-Sized Breeds
short_description: Designed for Medium Dogs: Measures 30 x 19 x 21 inches; sized for medium breeds between 21-40 lbs. For dogs near the upper size limit, consider sizing up for added comfort
Enhanced Security Features: Slide-bolt latches include patented Paw Block and locking tips; helps keep pets safely contained
All-Inclusive Design: Includes front and side doors, leak-proof plastic pan and rubber floor-protecting feet for added convenience
Easy Setup and Portability: Assembles in seconds with no tools; folds flat with handle for travel or storage
Built for Safety and Comfort: Rounded corners, proper ventilation, and low door thresholds create a secure den-like space
product_description: The New World folding metal dog crate by MidWest Homes for Pets includes all of the features you will need to provide a convenient, safe & secure pet home for your best friend, from puppy to adulthood. This crate includes a plastic leak-proof pan that allows easy clean-up in the event of an accident. We recently enhanced the safety and security of the New World crate by adding locking tips on the slide-bolt latches to securely lock the door the and patented Paw Block, which prohibits your dog from tampering with the door lock from the inside. New World crates also feature patented rounded side clips that reduce possible sharp points to ensure a safe experience for you and your pet. Every New World metal dog crate conveniently folds down flat for travel. The 30" New World (model B30DD) measures 30L x 19W x 21H inches and is suitable for "medium" dog breeds. **Please note the term "medium” breed is subjective. For the best fit, we advise that you check the measurements of the dog crate and select a size that will be suitable for your dog's ADULT weight and measurements. Your dog should be able to comfortably sit upright, lay down, and easily turn around inside the crate. When in doubt, we suggest you purchase a larger crate option. We at MidWest Homes for Pets understand that your dog is a part of your family; that's why we ensure our dog crates are manufactured with the highest quality control standards to create a safe and secure home for your pet. Assembly and safety instructions are included; please read all safety instructions prior to use.

name: Easycom Dog Crate Furniture, 31.5" Assembly-Free Dog Crates for Small & Medium Dogs, Foldable Dog Kennel Indoor with Tag & Adjustable Dog Bowls, Wooden Dog Cage Use as End Table, Rustic Brown
short_description: Assembly-Free(Patented Design): Say goodbye to complicated installations. Easycom’s pre-assembled dog crate furniture requires zero tools or screws—just unfold and it’s ready to use in under 30 seconds. Perfect for busy pet parents who need a secure, instant kennel.

3-in-1 Personalized Dog Tag: Create special moments with you and your pup! This versatile tag combines three thoughtful features: write your dog's name on the tag surface, display favorite photos via magnetic attachments, and decorate with fun DIY stickers - making every day together more joyful!

Den-Like Comfort with Style: Designed with a solid wood back and decorative X-pattern mesh on both sides, this farmhouse-inspired crate creates a cozy, secure space your pup can truly call home. More than just a dog crate, it also works beautifully as an end table, plant stand, or TV console—seamlessly blending into your decor with rustic charm and modern utility.

Adjustable Height & 360° Rotating Feeder: Make mealtime easier and healthier with our built-in dog bowls. Designed to fit perfectly in your crate, they adjust in height (2-level adjustment) to reduce neck strain and protect your pup’s spine. Feed from inside or outside—no more spills, just clean, happy meals!

Multi-Functional Dog Kennel:This foldable furniture dog crate sized at 31.5"W × 23.6"D × 26.6"H outside and 29.92"W × 21.65"D × 23.03"H inside, it’s ideal for small to medium dogs up to 120 pounds. The top supports 170 pounds, so you can easily use it as a side table without giving up space or style.

Durable Structure & Excellent Service:Built with reinforced 0.47" iron bars, this crate is chew-resistant and escape-proof. With 24/7 customer support, your peace of mind is always guaranteed. At Easycom, your satisfaction—and your pup’s comfort—are our top priorities.
